true.prompt: The doctor calls you to let you know that you have a rare genome in your blood. The doctors offers you 500k to do tests.
outcomes: Congrats, you were just scammed! The 18-year old doctor from Florida has reappeared after getting off from his 2017 fraud charges. You were his first victim. Your blood is VERY regular.
You continue with your monthly plasma donations

true.prompt: You are living a relatively healthy life. You are surprised at your yearly physical, when the doctor says you have high cholesterol. He offers you an expensive experimental treatment to lower cholesterol using nanomachines. You could instead eat healthier and exercise more.
outcomes: You pay for the treatment. The nanomachines make quick work of your cholesterol and you notice that you have more energy now. Modern science is amazing!
You strive to live a healthier lifestyle... for about 2 weeks. Then you just kinda forget about the doctor's advice.

false.prompt: You are the only person who has never caught Covid
outcomes: As you were leaping, you leaped into a pile of money. Its your lucky day.
You go on tour in your 60s and tell children at the library how you dodged Covid.You continue to take your vitamins and never catch the infamous bug.

false.prompt: Your knees are starting to hurt basically all the time now and you can hear the bones rubbing together whenever you take the stairs in your home. 'Is it time to move to a one-story house?', you ask yourself.
outcomes: You find a place without stairs, in a decent neighborhood, for a reasonable house. Getting older is annoying.
This is your home. You can't leave just because your knees hurt sometimes. Too many memories and besides, the mortgage is nearly paid off.
